channel.title: Blood stains and purple eyes glitch!
channel.description: I recently downloaded Black Mesa(Noob on this site) and every single NPC has blood stains all over them with purple eyes. This is definitely a glitch, how do I fix this??

item.title: Blood stains and purple eyes glitch!
item.dc:creator: MannyMMA
item.description:
dky.tehkingd.u:

Did you install to the correct directory?

I installed it to the default directory:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\sourcemods\BMS

Also sometimes the acid instead of green looks checkered purple and theres a lot of graphical issues

BTW I’m running this on Windows 7 Ultimate 64bit

Read full topic
item.source: Blood stains and purple eyes glitch!

item.title: Blood stains and purple eyes glitch!
item.dc:creator: deadlife101
item.description:
That glitch should only happen if you are running it in dxlevel 7 or you didn’t install it correctly.

Read full topic
